name: Horror Escape Doctor Hospital
description:
Are you ready to escape from horror escape doctor hospital games? then must try this horror escape doctor hospital games and find the way to get escape. You are trapped into the hospital where Dr jhon is doing some experiments with the patiences and suddenly there happened a blast where Dr Jhon turn into Zimbie, luckly you are saved in this experiment so now your survival starts. if you want to escape then find Dr jhon secret files, find the other patience dead bodies and main door where you can save your life.
Don't forget you also have to escape from Dr Jhon who will always following you!
